nodes.bodyText:
I had difficulties figuring out that the line above actually fills the Lists of the Maps with values by calling parseProperty and that those Lists are ArrayList instances that are sortable. Imho it is a pretty unexpected side-effect of a method with the name parseProperty...
But that's not the fault of your PR, so all fine for merging this!
I would also not expect these side effects as the current name suggests it's some kind of trivial operation. ;-)
